Token.Abstract: The RKMIMETypeSerialization class provides support for the registration of classes conforming to the RKSerialization protocol by MIME Type and the serialization and deserialization of content by MIME Type. Serialization implementations may be registered by an exact string match (i.e. 'application/json' for a JSON serialization implementation) or by regular expression to match MIME Type by pattern.
Registers the given serialization class to handle content for the given MIME Type identifier.

Parameter.Name: serializationClass
Parameter.Abstract: The class conforming to the RKSerialization protocol to be registered as handling the given MIME Type.

Parameter.Name: MIMETypeStringOrRegularExpression
Parameter.Abstract: A string or regular expression specifying the MIME Type(s) that given serialization implementation is to be registered as handling.

Token.Abstract: Unregisters the given serialization class from handling any MIME Types.

Parameter.Name: serializationClass
Parameter.Abstract: The class conforming to the RKSerialization protocol to be unregistered.

Token.Abstract: Returns the serialization class registered to handle the given MIME Type.

Parameter.Name: MIMEType
Parameter.Abstract: The MIME Type for which to return the registered RKSerialization conformant class.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A class conforming to the RKSerialization protocol registered for the given MIME Type or nil if none was found.

Token.Abstract: Returns a set containing the string values for all MIME Types for which a serialization implementation has been registered.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSSet object whose elements are NSString values enumerating the registered MIME Types.

Token.Abstract: Deserializes and returns a Foundation object representation of the given UTF-8 encoded data in the serialization format for the given MIME Type.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The UTF-8 encoded data representation of the object to be deserialized.

Parameter.Name: MIMEType
Parameter.Abstract: The MIME Type of the serialization format the data is in.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to an NSError object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Foundation object from the serialized data in data, or nil if an error occurs.

Token.Abstract: Serializes and returns a UTF-8 encoded data representation of the given Foundation object in the serialization format for the given MIME Type.

Parameter.Name: MIMEType
Parameter.Abstract: The MIME Type of the serialization format the data is in.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to an NSError object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Foundation object from the serialized data in data, or nil if an error occurs.
